robeger wrote:

> Is there an xsd file somewhere in the distribution for the order.xml
> file?  I looked around the directories, but haven't located one.  I
> noticed the order.xml file references a heritrix_settings.xsd though.

Its available whereever the admin webapp is served at 
'/heritrix_settings.xsd' (e.g. 
http://localhost:8080/heritrix_settings.xsd).  See 
$HERITRIX_HOME/src/webapps/admin under a source checkout.

It hasn't changed since it was added, 2004/10/20, but I just tried to 
validate a simple order file and it failed.  I fixed it.  So get HEAD 
version of the file.

St.Ack


>
